summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4439 for the improvement of West Smith Street, from 4th Avenue West to 5th Avenue West; by paving and otherwise improving the same; also West Smith Street, from 3rd Avenue West to 4th Avenue West (south side); by constructing concrete sidewalks; under Ordinance No. 52383, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
